name: 匿名信：失心者 / Strayer
description: A sudden anonymous letter broke everything, full internship police detective followed the letter to the long abandoned thirteen middle school time flies, the eyes of 十三 middle school is not once the ordinary middle school is a trap? Or the truth?
minimum_requirements: OS: XP,  7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: OS: XP,  7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
